author: BBC Earth
description:
Snares are simple wire traps set by poachers, but their impact on wildlife across Zambia is devastating. Godfrey Mwanza from Conservation South Luangwa tries to remove every snare from the park that he can, but that's not always possible.

Some will rise and some will fall...but who will rule this #Kingdom?
